author: norman
msg: Make sure we close the InputStream of the BlobMessage on dispose() if that is not done we get problems when try to delete the file on windows

author: gpetracek
msg: EXTCDI-6 extracting config via web.xml (to an add-on)

author: lhein
msg: fixed several errors regarding missing variables which were renamed in components-pom. also added org.osgi.compendium dep back to dep management as it made servicemix-exec unable to build. I added configuration for the maven-clean-plugin in the component pom to wipe out the folders "rootDir" and "activemq-data" from every module folder an mvn clean goal. This helps fixing an issue where the activemq-data folder made tests fail.
